author: Jamie Crawley
title: Spain's BBVA is Advising Clients to Invest Up to 7% of Portfolio in BTC, ETH: Reuters
description: The bank's head of blockchain solutions Philippe Meyer told the DigiAssets conference in London that it started advising on bitcoin in September last year.
content:
Spanish lender BBVA is advising its wealth clients to invest 3%-7% of their portfolios in cryptocurrencies, an executive of the Spanish bank said on Tuesday.
